_comment: Material-specific specification actions. Each material has up to 3 targeted actions for specifiers. Evidence prompts should vary (EPD / CoC / VOC / take-back / test data / provenance) to avoid repetition.

steel-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Aim for high recycled content (verify) and prefer electric arc furnace (EAF) production
Specify bolted connections for future disassembly and reuse
steel-columns-beams: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Aim for high recycled content (verify) and prefer electric arc furnace (EAF) production
Specify bolted connections for future disassembly and reuse
rammed-earth-structure: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Verify stabiliser content (target: <10% cement by volume) and confirm local soil sourcing
Request moisture management details for long-term durability
timber-flooring: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Check supplier offers refinishing service to extend lifespan
glass-door: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify high recycled cullet content and verify U-value meets or exceeds building regs
Specify toughened/laminated for safety and longevity
acoustic-ceiling-baffles: Provide third-party test data relevant to performance (e.g. fire classification, NRC/CAC, durability/warranty).
Verify recycled content of core material
Confirm modular system allows partial replacement
concrete-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify GGBS/PFA cement replacement; consider high-SCM mixes where appropriate
Verify formwork reuse strategy with contractor
rc-columns-beams: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify GGBS/PFA cement replacement; consider high-SCM mixes where appropriate
Confirm reinforcement uses high recycled content steel
glulam-structure: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify adhesive type and formaldehyde emissions
Verify fire treatment is non-toxic and doesn't impair recyclability
green-oak-structure: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify green oak is appropriately seasoned for application
Specify traditional joinery connections where possible
glulam-columns-beams: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify adhesive type and formaldehyde emissions
Verify structural calculations account for creep
clt-structure: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify moisture protection strategy during construction
brick-veneer: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Specify lime mortar to enable future brick recovery
polished-concrete: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify GGBS/PFA cement replacement; consider high-SCM mixes where appropriate
hybrid-structure: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify connection details allow for material separation at end-of-life
space-frame-structure: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Confirm coating system is durable and low-maintenance
nlt-structure: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
ggbs-concrete: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify GGBS replacement ratio (target: 50-70% by mass)
Confirm early-age strength gain suits programme
lino-floor: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify natural raw material content (linseed oil, cork, wood flour)
Specify low-VOC adhesive that allows future removal
recycled-terrazzo: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
rubber-floor: Confirm take-back scheme terms (what is accepted, in what condition, and who pays).
Specify click-fit system to enable partial replacement
grey-carpet: Confirm take-back scheme terms (what is accepted, in what condition, and who pays).
Verify recycled fibre content and type
Specify modular tiles for partial replacement
bamboo-parquet: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify formaldehyde emission class (E1 or better)
Confirm product can be refinished to extend lifespan
cork-plank-floor: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Confirm low-VOC finish and adhesive, and allow plank replacement
reclaimed-timber-floor: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Confirm treatment for pests/rot is non-toxic
Specify refinishing rather than replacement where possible
stone-paver: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Specify dry-laid or lime mortar bedding for future reuse
vinyl-planks: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Verify recycled PVC content and phthalate-free formulation
Specify click-fit system for partial replacement
resin-flooring: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Confirm substrate preparation allows future removal
microcement-floor: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify sealer is low-VOC and food-safe if applicable
Confirm crack repair protocol with supplier
ceramic-tiles: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Verify tile thickness is optimised for application
Specify removable fixing system where possible
epoxy-flooring: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Confirm system allows overcoating for maintenance
travertine-tiles: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Prioritise local supply to reduce transport impact
Specify honed finish to reduce processing energy
marble-floor: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Specify thinner formats where structurally appropriate
engineered-oak-floor: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify wear layer thickness allows refinishing
linoleum-tiles: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Specify low-VOC adhesive that allows future removal
aluminum-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify powder coating over anodising where appropriate
timber-frame: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
recycled-aluminum-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Prioritise high recycled content aluminium (verify) and confirm thermal break uses low-GWP materials
Specify long-life hardware to match frame lifespan
steel-window-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify recycled steel content and specify double glazing units with recycled glass
Verify galvanising or coating system durability
composite-window-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Confirm thermal performance matches energy targets
upvc-window-frame: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Verify recycled PVC content and lead-free stabilisers
curtain-wall-system: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify gasket materials with long service life
frameless-glazing: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify high recycled cullet content and low-VOC structural silicone
clay-plaster: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
Request guidance on humidity buffering performance
gypsum-wall: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
plasterboard-wall: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Confirm take-back scheme for offcuts and demolition
plywood-panels-wall: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify formaldehyde emission class (E1 or better)
Specify mechanical fixings for future removal
acoustic-panels-wall: Provide third-party test data relevant to performance (e.g. fire classification, NRC/CAC, durability/warranty).
Verify core material composition and recycled content
Confirm modular system allows partial replacement
glass-partitions: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify demountable framing system and high recycled cullet glass
brick-internal: Provide provenance and responsible sourcing evidence (reclaimed/local preferred where feasible).
concrete-block-wall: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify U-value of complete wall build-up
mineral-microcement: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
standard-wall-paint: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Choose durable finish to extend repainting cycles
custom-wall-paint: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Choose durable finish to extend repainting cycles
standard-ceiling-paint: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Verify anti-fungal properties for humid areas
custom-ceiling-paint: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Verify anti-fungal properties for humid areas
perforated-metal-ceiling: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify recycled steel/aluminium content and acoustic backing material composition
Specify clip-in system for easy access and replacement
timber-slat-ceiling: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Specify concealed fixing system for clean aesthetic
gypsum-ceiling: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify demountable tiles for services access
open-grid-ceiling: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Verify recycled metal content and coating durability/maintenance requirements
Confirm grid module suits services coordination
stretch-fabric-ceiling: Provide VOC/emissions evidence and declare key additives (e.g. plasticisers, flame retardants) where relevant.
Verify PVC/polyester content and fire rating
Confirm reinstallation possible for services access
coffered-ceiling: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Specify mechanical fixings for future access
plasterboard-ceiling: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and state the life-cycle stages covered.
Confirm access panel strategy for services
exposed-clt-ceiling: Provide FSC or PEFC chain-of-custody evidence (and provenance if reclaimed).
Verify fire treatment allows visible timber finish

Specify clip-in system for easy maintenance

Confirm tiles are compatible with demountable grid

Verify wool sourcing and moth treatment
